workshop.title: Journey To The Cloud: Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC) Hands-on Workshop
workshop.description: A hands-on event to explore Oracleâ€™s Integration Cloud.

labs.title: Home
labs.description: Welcome to the Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC) Integration workshop

labs.title: Lab 100: Exploring Oracle Integration Cloud
labs.description: This lab will expose you to the functionality in OIC Integration.

labs.title: Lab 200: Basic OIC Development (Hello World Integration)
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to build a 'hello world' echo service.

labs.title: Lab 300A: Online Shopping Integration Pre-Development
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to set up the OIC environment with elements that will be used in the next lab (LAB 300B).

labs.title: Lab 300B: Online Shopping Integration Development
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to take a sample integration flow and add additional components to finish the flow.

labs.title: Lab 400: Add VBCS Web Application to Trigger REST API
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to create a User Interface using VBCS, then call the REST API with online shopping request.

labs.title: Lab 500: Create Approval Workflow to Process Orders
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to use OIC Process Automation capability to implement a Business Process that will be triggered for suspended orders from online shopping API call.

labs.title: Lab 600: Add VBCS logic to Trigger PCS Approval Workflow
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to use OIC VBCS to invoke Approval Workflow when a suspended order is returned from from Online Shopping API.

labs.title: Lab 700: API Management Lab, Add Online Shopping API to APIPCS
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to use APIPCS to add an API for Online Shopping REST API and secure the API using Policies.

labs.title: Lab 800: Use VBCS to create an Online Shopping Mobile Application
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to use VBCS to build a mobile application, then call the REST API with online shopping request.

labs.title: Lab 900: Integration Analytics Implementation
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to implement an Integration Analytics Model with Milestones for Online Shopping Integration Flow.

labs.title: Lab 901: DevOps Tooling with Oracle Developer Cloud Service (DevCS) and Integration Cloud
labs.description: In this lab, we are going to use DevCS and OIC to implement Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment DevOps process.
